amendment.description: To establish the position of Chief Scientist of the National intelligence Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3772 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3772 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S10248-10250; text: CR S10249) To establish the position of Chief Scientist of the National intelligence Authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3772 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3772 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Bingaman.
